description: {"blocks":[{"key":"32v83","text":"This protocol outlines the sample preparation and running of the Olink 96 panel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"bbvaj","text":"Aliquoting and Day of Preparation ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1p4l7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ak4e","text":"For Aliquoting of EDTA plasma samples:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cenov","text":"Thaw all EDTA plasma samples in a -4°C refrigerator until ready to use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tqoa","text":"Keep Samples in a chilled rack whenever possible.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apqqe","text":"Match your parent tubes (Original tubes shipped) with a prelabelled 2mL
clarification tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2eei","text":"Vortex all samples on a Vortex Genie with a vortex setting of 7-10.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44etb","text":"Transfer samples from the parent tube to the clarification tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avkpq","text":"In a pre-cooled centrifuge set to -4°C centrifuge all samples for 5 minutes
on a setting of 20,000 rcf.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kg70","text":"Carefully remove samples from centrifuge into a chilled rack.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7drga","text":"Transfer liquid from the clarification tube to a prelabelled aliquot tube in
desired amounts.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fq27f","text":"Using Liquid Nitrogen, freeze back the tubes and place in a -80°C freezer
until ready to use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkcff","text":"

For EDTA samples on day of use:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":2,"length":31},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":2,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8cds","text":"Thaw all EDTA plasma samples in a -4°C refrigerator until ready to use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"410se","text":"Keep Samples in a chilled rack whenever possible.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qi75","text":"Vortex all samples on a Vortex Genie with a vortex setting of 7-10.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ida6","text":"In a pre-cooled centrifuge set to -4°C centrifuge all samples for 5 minutes
on a setting of 20,000 rcf.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hqjn","text":"Return the samples to a chilled rack.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6muo","text":"Your samples are ready for use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhc9j","text":"

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18qvp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epoca","text":"Once samples are prepared use the following links to access the protocols:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vcj3","text":"Olink Target 96 Short Instructions","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":34}],"data":{}},{"key":"e1br6","text":"Olink Target 96 User Manual","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":27}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E2FF20B03B9911EEA37D77BEE2D6A6C4","url":"http://chrome-extension://efaidnbmnnnibpcajpcglclefindmkaj/https://www.olink.com/content/uploads/2022/05/olink-target-96-short-instructions.pdf"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"FE40D1C03B9911EEA37D77BEE2D6A6C4","url":"http://chrome-extension://efaidnbmnnnibpcajpcglclefindmkaj/https://www.olink.com/content/uploads/2022/04/olink-target-96-user-manual.pdf"}}}}

title: U54 SCENT Olink® Target 96
